overview: The moment Carrie and her friends gather to start a fun concert to make our own special memories, an uninvited villain appears and begins to mess up the concert hall! "It's okay. If we're with our precious friends, we won't lose." They tried to start the concert again with their strengths despite the villain's interference! Our most precious friend, Cola, is gone?! Will Carrie and her friends be able to save Cola from the villain and finish our own concert safely?!
title: Save the Concert
